name: Eustress Engine Features
description: Key capabilities that make Eustress different from other game engines

items.name: 10x Faster Development
items.description: Hot reload, instant preview, and Soul scripting eliminate the compile-wait-test cycle that plagues traditional engines.

items.name: Zero GC Pauses
items.description: Unlike Unity's C# or other managed languages, Rust has zero garbage collection. Your games run smooth, always.

items.name: 10M+ Instances
items.description: Handle massive worlds with millions of entities. Point clouds, voxels, CAD data—Eustress scales where others choke.

items.name: 100% Memory Safe
items.description: Rust's ownership model eliminates crashes, memory leaks, and security vulnerabilities at compile time.

benchmarks.note: Benchmarks from empty project, release builds, 2024 hardware

scripting.name: Soul Scripting
scripting.description: Eustress uses Soul, a custom scripting language designed for game development. NOT visual scripting—Soul is a text-based language optimized for gameplay logic.
scripting.note: Eustress does NOT have visual scripting. It uses Soul scripting and native Rust.

multiplayer.name: Built-in Multiplayer
multiplayer.description: Native networking with automatic state synchronization, matchmaking, and voice chat support.

marketplace.name: Creator Marketplace
marketplace.description: Assets, Soul scripts, and avatar items from the community. Creators earn 25% revenue share (40% with Creator Pro).
